# EGG processing

```{r}
speaker <- "pl03"

praat_run(
    "./voicing-effect/code/sync-egg.praat",
    "voicing-effect",
    speaker,
    0
)
praat_run(
    "./voicing-effect/code/extract-vuv.praat",
    "voicing-effect",
    speaker,
    40,
    10000,
    11,
    0
)
praat_run(
    "./voicing-effect/code/degg-tracing.praat",
    "voicing-effect",
    speaker,
    40,
    10000,
    11
)
```
